name: xrltled
params: class c0, class c1, wff w0

stmt.origin: mpd(w0, wbr(c0, cle, c1), wbr(c0, clt, c1))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wbr(c0, cle, c1))
-| wi(w0, wbr(c0, clt, c1))
-| wi(w0, wi(wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(c0, cle, c1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wbr(c0, cle, c1))
-| wi(w0, wbr(c0, clt, c1))
-| wi(w0, wi(wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(c0, cle, c1)))

stmt.origin: syl2anc(w0, wi(wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(c0, cle, c1)), wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wi(wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(c0, cle, c1)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cxr))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cxr))
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr)), wi(wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(c0, cle, c1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wbr(c0, cle, c1))
-| wi(w0, wbr(c0, clt, c1))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cxr))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cxr))
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr)), wi(wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(c0, cle, c1)))

body.origin: |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr)), wi(wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(c0, cle, c1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wbr(c0, cle, c1))
-| wi(w0, wbr(c0, clt, c1))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cxr))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cxr))

comment: 'Less than' implies 'less than or equal to' for extended reals. Deduction form of ~ xrltle . (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
